title: [娱乐]FamoustLottery——卖彩票了！[1.12]
author: dbjdbj
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-14 22:20 编辑 

第一次发帖，不会排版，望见谅QAQ虽然是按着版规一点一点来的，但是万一有问题还请版主手下留情注意：本插件仅仅适用于1.12的Spigot和Bukkit端的服务器，版本低于1.12的腐竹可以离开了，不要在本贴浪费时间。版本号：V6.4.9介绍和特点:FamoustLottery是一个非常轻便且非常容易配置的一款彩票插件。这个插件可以通过指令或快捷菜单来配置彩票。无需任何前置插件，因为所有需要的东西都已经内置在插件里了。简便的配置方式和mysql的数据库支持可以帮助您同时创建和运营个人彩票。由于使用mysql数据库，您也可以将数据连接到您的网站，便可以在线展示各种的彩票统计信息。这个彩票插件拥有与众不同的独特模式，包括每轮可以有单个赢家或者多个赢家。所有指令：
/lottery info <lottery> – 显示指定彩票的信息/lottery buy <n> <Lottery> [player] – 给一个玩家买N张彩票/lottery create <name> – 创建一个新的彩票/lottery delete <Lottery> – 删除一个现有的彩票/lottery add <n> <Lottery> –为指定彩票设置奖金/lottery give <n> [player] – 给指定玩家免费的彩票/lottery change <n> <Lottery> – 改变指定彩票的奖金/lottery draw <Lottery>  – 设置中奖率（这个我也没大懂，原文是Draws the lottery.意思是抽签.希望高手指点一下）/lottery open <Lottery> – 开始运行彩票/lottery close <Lottery> – 停止运行彩票/lottery last <Lottery> –展示最后10个获奖者/lottery reload – 重载插件/lottery claim – 显示你的奖励/lottery about – 显示相关页面/lottery save – 保存设置/lottery regain – 从数据库恢复数据/lottery help [n] – 显示帮助页面欢迎各位大神纠正
　　　权限（还没翻译，因为我肚子饿了。日后我会补充的）FamoustLottery.info.* – Grant’s access to the information for all Lottery’s.FamoustLottery.info.<Lottery Grant’s access to the information for a certain Lottery.FamoustLottery.buy.* – Grant’s access to buy ticket’s from all Lottery’s.FamoustLottery.buy.<Lottery Grant’s access to buy tickets from a certain Lottery.FamoustLottery.buy.other.* – Grant’s access to buy tickets for another Player from all Lottery’s.FamoustLottery.buy.other.<Lottery Grant’s access to buy tickets for another Player from a certain Lottery.FamoustLottery.create – Grant’s access to create a Lottery.FamoustLottery.delete – Grant’s access to delete a Lottery.FamoustLottery.add.* – Grant’s access to add money from a Player’s balance to all Lottery’s.FamoustLottery.add.<Lottery Grant’s access to add money from a Player’s balance to a certain Lottery.FamoustLottery.give.* – Grant’s access to give tickets for all Lottery’s.FamoustLottery.give.<Lottery Grant’s access to give tickets for a certain Lottery.FamoustLottery.change.* – Grant’s access to change the Jackpot for all Lottery’s.FamoustLottery.change.<Lottery> – Grant’s access to change the Jackpot for a certain Lottery.FamoustLottery.draw.* – Grant’s access to draw all Lottery’s.FamoustLottery.draw.<Lottery Grant’s access to draw a certain Lottery.FamoustLottery.open.* – Grant’s access to open all Lottery’s.FamoustLottery.open.<Lottery Grant’s access to open a certain Lottery.FamoustLottery.close.* – Grant’s access to close all Lottery’sFamoustLottery.close.<Lottery Grant’s access to close a certain Lottery.FamoustLottery.last.* – Grant’s access to see the latest winners for all Lottery’s.FamoustLottery.last.<Lottery Grant’s access to see the latest winners for a certain Lottery.FamoustLottery.reload – Grant’s access to reload the plugin.FamoustLottery.save – Grant’s access to save all lotterys.FamoustLottery.regain – Grant’s access to regain data from a MySQL-DBFamoustLottery.edits.* – Grants access to all changing fieldsFamoustLottery.edits.broadcastbuy – Grants access to change broadcastBuyFamoustLottery.edits.broadcastdraw – Grants access to change broadcastDrawFamoustLottery.edits.delay – Grants access to change delayFamoustLottery.edits.econ – Grants access to change useEconFamoustLottery.edits.item – Grants access to change ItemFamoustLottery.edits.jackpotchance – Grants access to change the JackpotchanceFamoustLottery.edits.maxticketsbp – Grants access to change the maxTicketsByPlayerFamoustLottery.edits.maxtickets – Grants access to change the max Tickets in LotteryFamoustLottery.edits.minplayers – Grants access to change the minPlayersFamoustLottery.edits.mintickets – Grants access to change the minTicketsFamoustLottery.edits.price – Grants access to change the PriceFamoustLottery.edits.runtime – Grants access to change the RuntimeFamoustLottery.edits.taxholder – Grants access to change the taxholderFamoustLottery.edits.taxmultiplier – Grants access to change the taxmultiplierFamoustLottery.edits.maxwinners – Grants access to change the maxwinsFamoustLottery.edits.drawtype – Grants access to change the draw-typeFamoustLottery.edits.firstpercentage – Grants access to change the first-percentageFamoustLottery.edits.winningsound – Grants access to change the winning-soundFamoustLottery.edits.loosingsound – Grants access to change the loosing-soundFamoustLottery.edits.remindingsound – Grants access to change the reminding-sound等我吃饱了再来慢慢翻译
